law.catch_line: Prohibition against taking wildlife by person under influence of alcohol or controlled substance.

text.section:
A person shall not take or attempt to take wildlife with a firearm, bow, or crossbow, if the person is manifestly under the influence of alcohol or any controlled substance, and the person:
May endanger himself or herself or other persons or property; or
Is engaging in any behavior specified in subsection (1)(a) to (d) of KRS 525.060.
A peace officer may arrest a person for violating subsection (1) of this section.

law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 606, sec. 168, effective July 15, 1998.
